Name: Amazon
Description: The Amazon River is the largest river by discharge of water in the world, flowing through South America.

Name: Nile
Description: The Nile River is the longest river in the world, flowing through northeastern Africa.

Name: Yangtze
Description: The Yangtze River is the longest river in Asia and flows entirely within China.

Name: Mississippi
Description: The Mississippi River is the second-longest river in North America, flowing through the United States.

Name: Mekong
Description: The Mekong River flows through Southeast Asia, providing vital resources for the region's countries.
